'''Colored Planks''' were a briefly considered [[dye]]d version of [[planks]]. They have not been implemented, and [[stained terracotta]] was added instead.

== History ==
[[Nathan Adams]] briefly thought about implementing colored wood planks, releasing a test image on his Twitter page on April 24, 2013. This however never got implemented, as can be seen from the following quotes. The idea was eventually replaced with [[stained terracotta]].

Later updates have since then introduced new wood sets resembling some of the dyed plank colors:
* [[The Update that Changed the World]] added orange and brown planks in the form of {{BlockSprite|acacia-planks}} acacia and {{BlockSprite|dark-oak-planks}} dark oak planks
* The [[Nether Update]] added magenta and cyan planks in the form of {{BlockSprite|crimson-planks}} crimson and {{BlockSprite|warped-planks}} warped planks
* [[The Wild Update]] added red planks in the form of {{BlockSprite|mangrove-planks}} mangrove planks
* [[Trails & Tales]] added yellow and pink planks in the form of {{BlockSprite|bamboo-planks}} bamboo and {{BlockSprite|cherry-planks}} cherry planks
* [[The Garden Awakens]] added white planks in the form of {{BlockSprite|pale-oak-planks}} pale oak planks
